titles.title: Honoring Sisters Network Inc.® for its work to raise awareness about the tragic impact of breast cancer in the African-American community.
Honoring Sisters Network Inc.® for its work to raise awareness about the tragic impact of breast cancer in the African-American community.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: Honors Sisters Network Inc. for raising awareness about the impact of breast cancer in the African-American community. (African Americans are more likely to die from breast cancer than members of other racial groups.)
